text: Biefvillers-lès-Bapaume is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== Biefvillers-lès- Bapaume is a small farming village located just outside Bapaume and 12 miles (19 km) south of Arras. It was within the theatre of operations of the Battle of Bapaume, during the Franco-Prussian War. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Vaast, rebuilt, as was much of the village, after the ravages of World War I. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Biefvillers-lès-Bapaume
